title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in with valid credentials despite multiple attempts. They have tried resetting their password, but the issue still persists. This is preventing them from accessing their account completely.

title: Payment Failure - Checkout Error
description: The payment gateway is showing an error whenever the customer tries to complete a purchase. They have confirmed that their card is valid and funds are available. This issue is blocking the checkout process entirely.

title: Slow Website - Mobile Performance Issue
description: The customer reports that the website is loading very slowly when accessed from a mobile device. They mentioned that it works fine on desktop but becomes frustratingly unresponsive on mobile. This affects their overall experience.

title: Account Locked - Multiple Failed Logins
description: The account became locked after several unsuccessful login attempts. The customer is now unable to access their account and requires assistance. They have requested a manual reset or unlock from support.

title: Refund Request - Duplicate Charge
description: The customer noticed that they were charged twice for the same order. They are requesting a refund for the duplicate payment. The issue is urgent as they are concerned about their financial security.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode Support
description: The customer has requested a new feature that adds dark mode support to the website and app. They believe it would improve usability at night and reduce eye strain. This request has been logged for future consideration.

title: Email Issue - Confirmation Not Received
description: The customer reports that they are not receiving confirmation emails after placing orders. They have checked their spam folder, but the emails are missing. This makes it difficult for them to track their purchases.

title: Broken Link - FAQ Page Error
description: The customer found that the FAQ page link is broken and leads to a 404 error. This prevents users from accessing important help information. They reported it to ensure customers can easily find answers to common questions.

title: Subscription Cancelation - Dashboard Issue
description: The customer is unable to cancel their subscription directly from the dashboard. They have tried multiple times but the cancel button does not respond. This is causing frustration as they do not want to be charged again.

title: Mobile App Crash - Android 14 Issue
description: The mobile app is crashing immediately upon startup for users on Android 14. Customers cannot access any part of the app, which makes it unusable. This is a High problem affecting a significant number of users.

title: Order Delay - Shipment Not Sent
description: The customer placed an order more than five days ago, but it has not yet been shipped. They are worried about missing a deadline and are asking for an update. The delay is impacting their confidence in the service.

title: UI Bug - Checkout Page Overlap
description: The customer noticed that some text elements overlap on the checkout page. This makes it difficult to read and proceed with the payment process. They are requesting a fix to improve the user interface experience.
